drawing
Interface Drawing

All Known Implementing Classes:
DrawingFrame
public interface Drawing

Drawing interface.
It is possible to put the pen on a precise point and to draw a line from the current point to another one.

Method Summary
 void drawTo(java.awt.Point p)
          Draw a line from the current point to p. p becomes the current point.
 java.awt.Point getCurrentPoint()
          Gets the currentPoint attribute of the Drawing object
 int getHeight()
          Gets the height attribute of the Drawing object
 int getWidth()
          Gets the width attribute of the Drawing object
 void goTo(java.awt.Point p)
          Go to the point p without drawing a line. p becomes the current point.
 void reset()
          Put the Drawing object in its initial state.
 

Method Detail

drawTo

void drawTo(java.awt.Point p)
            throws DrawingException
Draw a line from the current point to p. p becomes the current point.

Parameters:
p - point
Throws:
DrawingException - if p has not correct coordinates
